citations.narrative:
On November 13, 2022, after animal care staff completed husbandry rounds, the hook used to hold the guillotine door
open for sheltered dog enclosure F13 became unlatched. When the guillotine door closed, the two dogs inside the
enclosure did not have access to the indoor part of the enclosure where the water lixit was located. According to records,
the two dogs were reviewed by veterinary staff on November 14, 2022, and provided with water.
Potable water must be continuously available to the dogs, unless restricted by the attending veterinarian.
Corrected before the time of inspection
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
On November 13, 2022, after animal care staff completed husbandry rounds, the hook used to hold the guillotine door 
open for sheltered dog enclosure F13 became unlatched. When the guillotine door closed, the two dogs inside the 
enclosure did not have access to the indoor part of the enclosure where the water lixit was located. According to records, 
the two dogs were reviewed by veterinary staff on November 14, 2022, and provided with water.  
 
Potable water must be continuously available to the dogs, unless restricted by the attending veterinarian.  
 
Corrected before the time of inspection 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
